participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, enjoys helping others and finding joy in small things.
participant_1.background: I once drew a picture of the officer as a pig and showed it to him. I enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every morning and worry about my cats while on tour. My brother works at Best Buy. I enjoy watching my favorite sport, football, on social media. I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Practical and hardworking, values family and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I go to a shelter to volunteer and get my car fixed. My car is my most valued possession because it allows me to travel to and from work and to enjoy my favorite pastime, watching sports. Until then I will make 215 an hour. I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time. I've been married five times.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
It's going pretty well! I just got back from volunteering at the local animal shelter.
That's awesome! I love animals! What did you do there?
I helped to clean up the cages and feed the animals. It was really rewarding.
I bet it was! I used to volunteer at my local animal shelter when I was younger. It was so much fun.
It's definitely a great way to give back to the community.
What do you do for work?
I'm a farmer. I grow corn, soybeans, and wheat.
That sounds like a lot of work!
It can be, but it's also very rewarding. I love working outdoors and being my own boss.
I can imagine! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs and a cat.
That's great! I have two cats and a dog.
We should get together sometime and let our pets play together.
That sounds like a great idea! I'll let you know when I'm free.
